text: Henryk Glücklich (22 January 1945 – 23 September 2014) was a Polish speedway racer. He was an international motorcycle speedway rider. He appeared in the Speedway World Championship finals three times, finishing fifth in 1970. He also rode in five World Team Cup finals. Glücklich was born in Rybnik, Poland. Glücklich died in Berlin, Germany, aged 69. ==References== Category:1945 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Polish speedway riders
title: Henryk Glücklich
